help.short: Name of the VNet gateway.
Name of the VNet gateway.
Name of the VNet gateway.
The name of edge zone.
Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=<location>`.
Configure this gateway to accept traffic from other Azure Virtual Networks. This configuration does not support connectivity to Azure Virtual WAN.
Configures this gateway to accept traffic from remote Virtual WAN networks.
Maximum scale units for auto-scale configuration.
Minimum scale units for auto-scale configuration.
Whether private IP needs to be enabled on this gateway for connections or not.
Name or ID of a local network gateway representing a local network site with default routes.
The gateway type.
IP configurations for virtual network gateway.
Resource ID.
The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.
The private IP address allocation method.
The reference to the public IP resource.
test
VNet gateway SKU.
The Extended vnet resource id of the local gateway.
VPN authentication types enabled for the virtual network gateway.
The generation for the virtual network gateway. vpn_gateway_generation should not be provided if gateway_type is not Vpn.
VPN routing type.
Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.
The AADAudience ID of the VirtualNetworkGateway.
The AAD Issuer URI of the VirtualNetworkGateway.
The AAD Tenant URI of the VirtualNetworkGateway.
Autonomous System Number to use for the BGP settings.
IP address to use for BGP peering.
Weight (0-100) added to routes learned through BGP peering.
Enable BGP (Border Gateway Protocol).
BGP peering address with IP configuration ID for virtual network gateway.
The list of custom BGP peering addresses which belong to IP configuration.
The ID of IP configuration which belongs to gateway.
VirtualNetworkGatewayNatRule Resource.
lines: Usage: --nat-rule name=rule type=Static mode=EgressSnat internal-mappings=10.4.0.0/24 external-mappings=192.168.21.0/24 ip-config-id=/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworkGateways/gateway1/ipConfigurations/default
name: Required.The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.
internal-mappings: Required.The private IP address internal mapping for NAT.
external-mappings: Required.The private IP address external mapping for NAT.
type: The type of NAT rule for VPN NAT.
mode: The Source NAT direction of a VPN NAT.
ip-config-id: The IP Configuration ID this NAT rule applies to.
